hero.description: If it works and it's clean - it's good.

aboutME.title: About Me...
aboutME.description: Backend Developer with a B.Sc. in Computer Science and practical experience in developing end-to-end solutions in personal projects. Skilled in problem-solving, data analysis, and drawing conclusions, with a continuous interest in new technologies and self-learning. Possesses strong independent work capabilities, alongside effective teamwork skills. Seeking a challenging role in software development where I can continue to grow professionally and and contribute to both the team and the product.
